metadata.name: Surrender Music Video #1/32
metadata.description:
Minted for Seekers Society Beta participants. 

Footage is from our headline show at the Stereo Garden in Patchogue, NY on July 1, 2022. Shots courtesy of Bruce Videography Services. Music video edited by Nick Eustaquio.

LYRICS:

Follow, as instructed  
Repeat our every line.  
One nation under God  
We feed by selling lives.  
Where will you run,  
Where will you hide? We will come for you!  
 
Your head fills with voices  
They call to you…  
 
Follow, as instructed  
Repeat our every line  
One nation under God  
We feed by selling lies.  
Where will you run?  
Where will you hide? We will come for you!  
 
Your head fills with voices  
They call to you…  
 
I’m at the edge, I won’t look away  
Falling from grace, I say…  
You know you’re more than the label they read  
Fight ‘til the death and don’t surrender…  
Don’t surrender…

Don’t let them break your mind!  
 
One nation!  
One God!  
Our nation!  
Surrender!
